snippet: California  Cartoonists' Anger Spurs Caricatures      Never pick a fight with anyone who buys ink by the barrel, or so it has been said. Brad Sherman, a Democratic candidate for Congress from California, might add ''especially anyone who draws.''...
lead_paragraph: California Cartoonists' Anger Spurs Caricatures Never pick a fight with anyone who buys ink by the barrel, or so it has been said. Brad Sherman, a Democratic candidate for Congress from California, might add ''especially anyone who draws.''
abstract: Political Briefing column; Brad Sherman, Democratic candidate for Congress from California, has misfortune to be running in district that includes San Fernando Valley, home to many cartoonists; artists in district have set up Web page to contribute unflattering depictions of his work on state tax board, which taxes commercial illustrations; cartoon (S)
